TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract MailMergeFields implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 对象的集合 ，这些对象代表文档中的邮件合并相关域。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the mail merge related fields in a document.

para.span: 使用 属性返回MailMergeFields集合。

span.span: Use the property to return the MailMergeFields collection.

para.span: 使用 方法将合并域添加到MailMergeFields集合中。

span.span: Use the method to add a merge field to the MailMergeFields collection.

para.span: 使用Fields（ ），其中 是索引号，返回一个MailMergeField对象。

span.span: Use Fields(), where is the index number, to return a single MailMergeField object.

para.span: MailMergeFields集合包含其他方法（例如 和 ），用于添加与邮件合并操作相关的字段。

span.span: The MailMergeFields collection has additional methods, such as and , for adding fields related to a mail merge operation.

span.span: Returns a object that represents a mail merge field added to the data source document.

The location for the ASK field.

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 向其分配担负或默认文字的书签名称。

span.span: The bookmark name that the response or default text is assigned to.

param.span: 使用 REF 域和该书签名可在文档中显示结果。

span.span: Use a REF field with the bookmark name to display the result in a document.

param.name: Prompt

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 在对话框中显示的文字。

span.span: The text that's displayed in the dialog box.

param.name: DefaultAskText

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 默认答复，将在显示对话框时显示在文本框中。

span.span: The default response, which appears in the text box when the dialog box is displayed.

param.span: 相当于 ASK 域的 \d 开关。

span.span: Corresponds to the \d switch for an ASK field.

param.name: AskOnce

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则仅显示对话框一次，而不是每次合并新的数据记录时。

span.span: True to display the dialog box only once instead of each time a new data record is merged.

param.span: 相当于 ASK 域的 \o 开关。

span.span: Corresponds to the \o switch for an ASK field.

summary.span: 将一个 ASK 域添加到邮件合并主文档。

span.span: Adds an ASK field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: 更新时，ASK 域将显示一个对话框，提示您给指定书签分配文字。

span.span: When updated, an ASK field displays a dialog box that prompts you for text to assign to the specified bookmark.

param.name: AskOnce

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则仅显示一次提示，而不是每次合并新的数据记录时。

span.span: True to display the prompt only once instead of each time a new data record is merged.

param.span: 对应于 FILLIN 域的 \o 开关。

span.span: Corresponds to the \o switch for a FILLIN field.
The default value is False.

summary.span: 将 FILLIN 域添加到邮件合并主文档。

span.span: Adds a FILLIN field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: 更新时，FILLIN 域将显示一个对话框，提示您输入文本将插入 FILLIN 域位置的文档。

span.span: When updated, a FILLIN field displays a dialog box that prompts you for text to insert into the document at the location of the FILLIN field.

para.span: 将 方法与 集合对象一起使用，可将 FILLIN 域添加到邮件合并主文档之外的文档中。

span.span: Use the method with the collection object to add a FILLIN field to a document other than a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 将一个 IF 域添加到邮件合并主文档。

span.span: Adds an IF field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: 更新时，IF 域会将数据记录中的字段与指定值进行比较，然后根据比较结果插入相应的文本。

span.span: When updated, an IF field compares a field in a data record with a specified value, and then it inserts the appropriate text according to the result of the comparison.

span.span: Required object.
The location for the MERGEREC field.

summary.span: 将 MERGEREC 域添加到邮件合并主文档。

span.span: Adds a MERGEREC field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: MERGEREC 域在邮件合并过程中插入当前数据记录的编号（当前查询结果中的数据记录的位置）。

span.span: A MERGEREC field inserts the number of the current data record (the position of the data record in the current query result) during a mail merge.

span.span: Required object.
The location for the MERGESEQ field.

summary.span: 将一个 MERGESEQ 域添加到邮件合并主文档。

span.span: Adds a MERGESEQ field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: MERGESEQ 字段根据合并数据记录的顺序插入数字（例如，当合并记录50的记录到 100 50 时，MERGESEQ 将插入数字1）。

span.span: A MERGESEQ field inserts a number based on the sequence in which data records are merged (for example, when record 50 of records 50 to 100 is merged, MERGESEQ inserts the number 1).

span.span: Required object.
The location for the NEXT field.

summary.span: 将下一个字段添加到邮件合并主文档。

span.span: Adds a NEXT field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: NEXT 域将转到下一条数据记录，以便可以将多条记录中的数据合并到同一个合并文档中（例如，一张邮件标签）。

span.span: A NEXT field advances to the next data record so that data from more than one record can be merged into the same merge document (for example, a sheet of mailing labels).

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: NEXTIF 字段将比较两个表达式，如果比较结果为 true，则将下一个数据记录合并到当前合并文档中。

span.span: A NEXTIF field compares two expressions, and if the comparison is true, the next data record is merged into the current merge document.

The location for the SKIPIF field.

The merge field name.

span.span: Adds a SKIPIF field to a mail merge main document.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: SKIPIF 字段将比较两个表达式，如果比较结果为 true，则 SKIPIF 将移动到数据源中的下一条数据记录，并启动一个新的合并文档。

span.span: A SKIPIF field compares two expressions, and if the comparison is true, SKIPIF moves to the next data record in the data source and starts a new merge document.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };
member this.Creator : int

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则此属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.
